product_name: Native Eyewear Trango Polarized Sunglasses - Women's
long_description: The Native Trango polarized sunglasses feature interchangeable lenses to protect you eyes from sunshine and glare 365 days of the year. Each frame includes 1 set of polarized lens and 1 set of SportFlex(TM) lenses, for a total of 2 sets of lenses. Interchangeable lens system lets you switch lenses to accommodate a variety of light conditions and activities. N3(TM) polarized lenses block 40% of infrared light (decreasing eye fatigue), offer UV protection and blue light filtering to minimize haze and enhance clarity. Lenses are built to withstand a high-velocity impact. Frames endure extreme highs and lows in temperature. Frames are extremely lightweight, yet flexible and durable enough to withstand high velocity collisions. Self-adjusting Cushinol(TM) nosepads and ear stems create a nonslip grip that keeps sunglasses in place, ensuring a soft feel and personalized fit. Temple ends hug behind your ears to keep sunglasses in place. Cam-action spring hinges quickly lock temples into position. Maple Tort frames feature polarized brown lenses that are ideal for bright sunlight; brown tint enhances contrast and definition. Asphalt frames feature polarized gray lenses and are ideal for extremely bright sunlight; gray tint helps maintain color saturation and natural contrasts. Additional SportFlex orange-yellow lenses have a mirror coating suitable for a range of low lighting-cloudy, overcast, dusk and dawn. Native Trango interchangeable polarized sunglasses include a protective case and a soft pouch that doubles as a cleaning cloth. Frames best fit medium to large profiles.
short_description: The Native Trango polarized sunglasses feature interchangeable lenses to protect you eyes from sunshine and glare 365 days of the year.
